desc: Galena Farms has the widest selection of well known beehive brands like Hoover Hives, NuBees, and Busy Bees 'N' More. Whether you're looking for an Amish made hive, a wax coated hive, or just an affordable hive for your new apiary, we have all the beekeeping supplies you'll need to begin your journey as a beekeeper.

layout.text:
Wax dipped & coated hives provide a sustainable
option that provides protection & durability.
